title: Healthcare Practice Websites
description: HIPAA-compliant websites and systems for medical practices, dentists, chiropractors, and wellness providers.
heroSubheadline: Modern healthcare websites that make it easy for patients to find you, book appointments, and stay engaged with their care.

problems.description: Staff spending hours playing phone tag for simple appointments
Empty slots from forgotten appointments hurt revenue
Patients filling out the same info every visit

solutions.description: Let patients book, reschedule, and manage appointments online
Automated text/email reminders that actually work
Patients complete forms at home before appointments

caseStudies.name: Elm Street Dental
caseStudies.quote: The reminder system paid for itself in the first month. Our schedule stays full now.
